explanation:
code_hardening: Initialized the return value to the provided default boolean and ensured a safe fallback to that default on all non-fatal failure paths; marked parameters as final and added error logging with key and default.
resolve_compilation_errors: Updated the method signature to getBoolean with a Boolean return type, accepted a ClassLoader instead of Context, and reflected android.os.SystemProperties.getBoolean(String, boolean) with correct parameter types and invocation arguments.
exception_handling: Preserved rethrowing of IllegalArgumentException exactly, while catching generic Exception for reflection-related failures, logging the error, and returning the default value.
logic_customization: Switched from string-based property access to boolean-based access, used the provided ClassLoader directly, passed the boolean default into the reflective call, and ensured the default is returned when the property is missing or invocation fails.
refactoring: Renamed locals to reflect boolean semantics (e.g., result), simplified parameter array creation, and aligned comments/behavior with boolean return semantics.
misc: Added Android logging via android.util.Log.e consistent with existing class style; new custom API usage: android.os.SystemProperties.getBoolean(String, boolean) via reflection and android.util.Log.e(String, String, Throwable).
